text: The nice thing about that is that it filters out the shitty and greedy ones
Agreed, currently I only search jobs at Stackoverflow careers
or here :smile:
so careers is well cool, just under utilised
I hope it won't be cluttered by recruiters in the future
If they have an API we could have linkbait jobs scour it as well
<http://meta.stackexchange.com/questions/158005/stackoverflow-careers-api>

attachments.title: Stackoverflow Careers API
attachments.text: So SO has an API for most of the site(questions, members, etc.), but I was unable to find any information on an public API for the Careers site. Does one exist? If not, is there any plans for one?

text: Careers works quite we tbh. Companies see your full profile ahead of time , they message you and you arrange interview
I am advocating it because I actually just had an interview with a UK bank due to SO Careers
<@U09T8SFG8> Sound interesting!
<@U06CMRAC9|jstav> has joined the channel
<@U0N7D6F50> jobs Android, NC
<@U0N7D6F50> jobs Android, North Carolina
<@U0N7D6F50> jobs Android, New York
<@U0N7D6F50> are you alive?
it was typing, then stopped typing
Yeah it looks like LinkedIn has wizened up to our scraping
It's trying to force <@U0N7D6F50>  to login
im guessing u gotta pay to get their job search api? or can u implement it via token or whatever?
I dunno. This was the best I could do at the time.
you’d think these job posting sites would LOVE exposing their job listings to api consumers… it only provides more value to the companies paying for the listings
<@U053LEHJN>  and <@U04TK850N> were talking about some alternative solution yesterday
Let's see what they come up with
they’re all scraping each other anyway
you look at indeed or monster and click on a link and see how deep the rabbit hole goes

Hello, everyone! Wanna create Android apps in your pajamas at home for some of the most well known and respected brands on Earth? MartianCraft is looking for a US-based mid level Android developer. MartianCraft is a software design and development agency building apps for folks like IBM, Fox, Apple, and many others. We offer both contract and full time positions. All positions are remote, telecommute, and flextime. Comfortable work atmosphere that is results driven. Benefits such as gym membership, unlimited time off, and company sponsored events. Full time positions provide 401(k), top of line healthcare for you and your entire family, vision with LASIK coverage, and dental. Competitive pay and benefits. MartianCraft is an equal opportunity employer.

Ideally, we'd like someone with 3 years of software development experience, including a couple of years doing native Android development. You should have experience working with remote data via REST and JSON, and have valuable experience with third-party libraries and APIs. Not sure if you qualify? In short, if you're based in the US, are excited about Android development, and have a couple of kickass Android apps that you're proud to show off, I'd really like to hear from you!

As mentioned, unfortunately this position is US-only due to project specific requirements. If this sounds interesting, please DM or email me directly -- <mailto:josh@martiancraft.com|josh@martiancraft.com> -- with your resume.

text: <@U1E65QLQ0|jhight> pinned a message to this channel.
US only :disappointed:
xD
yeah, unfortunately this position is US only, though we have employees all over the US, EU, and Canada
it’s just this position requires a US-based developer
I live in Portugal, I need to move to the US xD
(just to clarify, we are considering US citizens based abroad as well)

Hi there! I’m Matias, CEO at Codea IT and we are constantly looking for Mobile Developers to join our Worldwide Remote Team for participating in very interesting projects.
We also offer Software Outsourcing and Staff Augmentation services if you are already a Software Factory looking for candidates.

DM me if you are interested.
